name: m a g e
description:
a small game done for my game design course!!

its only the second game ive made so bare with it haha

you play as azu, a small magical cat creature, who needs to venture into the nearby cave to collect crystals!!

however, the cave is home to shadow beings called kral who take the form of crows and are not happy with his presence, azu must be careful not to get hurt!
